alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 5:06AM AKST until January 25 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility. Visibility one half mile or less at times. West winds gusting to 45 mph. Wind chills to 50 below. * WHERE...Central Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. Wind chills to 50 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to decrease late this evening with blowing snow ending then.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
